item.content:encoded:
0.27.51 (2021-07-13)

Bug Fixes

  • Use orphaned timeout from query body, pre-aggregations queue, debug API (#3088) (83e0a0a)
  • @cubejs-client/core: incorrect types for logical and/or in query filters (#3083) (d7014a2)

Features

  • Manual build pre-aggregations, getter for queue state, debug API (#3080) (692372e)

item.title: Release notes from neovim: NVIM v0.6.0-dev+42-geece0735f
item.content:encoded:
Nvim development (prerelease) build

NVIM v0.6.0-dev+42-geece0735f
Build type: RelWithDebInfo
LuaJIT 2.1.0-beta3

Install

Windows

  1. Extract nvim-win64.zip (or nvim-win32.zip)
  2. Run nvim-qt.exe

macOS

  1. Download nvim-macos.tar.gz
  2. Extract: tar xzvf nvim-macos.tar.gz
  3. Run ./nvim-osx64/bin/nvim

Linux (x64)

  1. Download nvim.appimage
  2. Run chmod u+x nvim.appimage && ./nvim.appimage
    • If your system does not have FUSE you can extract the appimage: 
      ./nvim.appimage --appimage-extract
./squashfs-root/usr/bin/nvim

Other

  • Install by package manager

SHA256 Checksums

31bf0e3b07cbe648d203fffb30654163c3d1d3a0ba307df1dd8024f74934656b  nvim-linux64.tar.gz
8456ce8e929bb441c443a002613c6ecbec54dccfe220c02606b0cd1ade516a95  nvim.appimage
887cc75328ee19c6376f0460de8ae36a07d51f07e7eec640810910c70f4eacdb  nvim.appimage.zsync
8aab5d2f933b1a9c09a273787f77a074a61b512d53113db507ffd821f5a7c2ef  nvim-macos.tar.gz
07e550d4b462a719ce3f0390f0e443fdb5d8369d8e46db99ee64f2d52e84b758  nvim-win64.zip
94ce40c5bf8f85d44723e5202741e77cc23ad7982defc4ae12163b8a54d31a12  nvim-win32.zip

item.title: Release notes from electron: electron v14.0.0-beta.13
item.content:encoded:
Note: This is a beta release. Please file new issues for any bugs you find in it.

This release is published to npm under the beta tag and can be installed via npm install electron@beta, or npm install electron@14.0.0-beta.13.

Release Notes for v14.0.0-beta.13

Features

  • Added missing resourceType conversions for webRequest listener details: font, ping, cspReport, media, webSocket. #30050
  • Added support for Windows Control Overlay on macOS. #29986

Fixes

  • Fixed requestFullscreen inside webview does not make the element take fullscreen. #29989 (Also in 12, 13)
  • Fixed an issue where Electron would sometimes not honor the user-defined Downloads directory. #29967 (Also in 12, 13)
  • Fixed key window status on mac when opening panels or using custom window switchers. #30066 (Also in 12)
  • Fixed memory leak when creating notification on macOS. #30008 (Also in 12, 13)

Other Changes

  • Updated Chromium to 93.0.4566.0. #29979

Documentation

  • Documentation changes: #30058

item.title: Release notes from next.js: v11.0.2-canary.13
item.content:encoded:
Core Changes

  • Replace withCoalescedInvoke with ResponseCache: #26997
  • Add some missing fields to the NextConfig type: #27126

Documentation Changes

  • [docs] Layouts & Going to Production: #27021
  • Add jsdoc types to docs snippets: #27125

Example Changes

  • Clean up examples package.json: #27121

Misc Changes

  • Add test for placeholder=blur with assetPrefix: #27120

Credits

Huge thanks to @styfle, @leerob, @devknoll, and @lucleray for helping!

item.title: Release notes from filament: v1.10.7
item.content:encoded:
• engine: Spot-light position calculation moved to fragment shader.
  • engine: Small shadow mapping fixes and improvements.
  • gltfio: Add fast path for native material providers.
  • gltfio: Allow Java / Kotlin clients to customize MaterialProvider.
  • engine: Fix out of bounds access with RenderTarget java bindings.
  • Metal: TextureFormat::DEPTH24_STENCIL8 now maps to a 32 bit depth format on iOS.

item.title: Release notes from next.js: v11.0.2-canary.12
item.content:encoded:
Core Changes

  • Bind sendBeacon to navigator: #26601
  • Fall back to fallbackSend when send is false: #27113
  • Upgrades web-vitals to v1.1.2.: #25272
  • Prevent timeout when loading routes in development: #25749
  • Workaround for Node.js 16+ on Apple Silicon M1: #27031

Documentation Changes

  • Mention customization of next.config.js to import images: #27104

Example Changes

  • Update SuperTokens dependency version in with-supertokens example: #27110
  • fix tailwind error: #27042
  • [examples] Use Strapi template: #27114

Credits

Huge thanks to @timneutkens, @rishabhpoddar, @enesakar, @ctbarna, @markkaylor, @stovmascript, and @styfle for helping!

item.title: Release notes from ant-design: 4.16.7
item.content:encoded:
• üêû Fix DatePicker date cell not centered when used in Table. #31306 @Map1en
  • üêû Fix Desciptions border missing when inside Table. #31307
  • üêû Fix InputNumber border and interactive handler not matched. #31300 @diyews
  • Table
    • üêû Fix incomplete display of the upper border of the table when the window is too small. #31298 @Map1en
    • üêû Fix Table rowSelection.selectedRows don't sync in initial state. #31224 @kerm1it
    • üêû Fix Table filteredValue not work with nested columns. #30815 @moraispgsi
  • Form
    • üêû Fix Form Input outline color under Form validation. #31240
    • üÜï Form add name as a default label value in validationMessages. #30179 @jameslahm
  • üíÑ Fix Rate focus ring style in Safari. #31241
  • üíÑ Tweak Select arrow icon position. #31234
  • üêû Input will not trigger onBlur when click clear icon now which resolve that editable table input cannot be cleared. #31202
  • üêû Fix Tooltip arrowPointAtCenter 1px shift bug. #31201
  • üíÑ Fix Menu.Item hover color transition style. #31189
  • üêû Fix Dropdown.Button don't support overlayClassName and overlayStyle. #31187
  • üíÑ Adjust Pagination pattern of disabled-active buttons align with Radio style. #31185 @Map1en
  • üêû Fix the path error when packaging the component style export file in the Windows environment. #31277 @aoxiang78
  • üåê Add selectNone for en_GB locale file. #31264 @Map1en
  • TypeScript
    • ü§ñ Adjust Transfer listStyle definition to be optional. #31322 @geekrainy
  • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç DatePicker Âú® Table ÂÜÖ‰ΩøÁî®Êó∂Êó•ÊúüÊú™Â±Ö‰∏≠ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#31306 @Map1en
  • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Descriptions Âú® Table ÂÜÖËæπÊ°Ü‰∏¢Â§±ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#31307
  • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç InputNumber ËæπÊ°ÜÂíå‰∫§‰∫íËåÉÂõ¥‰∏çÂåπÈÖçÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#31300 @diyews
  • Table
    • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Table ÂΩìÁ™óÂè£ËøáÂ∞èÊó∂‰∏äËæπÊ°ÜÊòæÁ§∫‰∏çÂÆåÂÖ®ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#31298 @Map1en
    • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Table rowSelection ÁöÑ selectedRows Â±ûÊÄßÂú®ÂàùÂßãÂåñÊó∂‰∏çÂêåÊ≠•ÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#31224 @kerm1it
    • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Table ÁªÑÂêàÂàó‰∏äÁöÑÁ≠õÈÄâÁä∂ÊÄÅ filteredValue ‰∏çÁîüÊïàÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#30815 @moraispgsi
  • Form
    • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Form ÈîôËØØÊ†°È™åÁä∂ÊÄÅ‰∏ã Input ÁöÑËÅöÁÑ¶Â§ñÊ°ÜËâ≤„ÄÇ#31240
    • üÜï Form Â¢ûÂä† name ‰Ωú‰∏∫È™åËØÅÊ∂àÊÅØ label ÁöÑÈªòËÆ§ÂÄº„ÄÇ#30179 @jameslahm
  • üíÑ ‰øÆÂ§ç Rate Âú® Safari ‰∏ãËÅöÁÑ¶Â§ñÊ°ÜÁöÑÊ†∑Âºè„ÄÇ#31241
  • üíÑ ÂæÆË∞É Select ÁÆ≠Â§¥ÂûÇÁõ¥‰ΩçÁΩÆ„ÄÇ#31234
  • üêû Ê∏ÖÈô§ Input ÂÜÖÂÆπÊó∂‰∏çÂÜçËß¶Âèë onBlurÔºå‰øÆÂ§çÂèØÁºñËæëË°®Ê†º Input Êó†Ê≥ïÊ≠£Á°ÆÊ∏ÖÈô§ÂÜÖÂÆπÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#31202
  • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Tooltip arrowPointAtCenter Êúâ‰∏ÄÂÉèÁ¥†ÂÅèÁßªÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#31201
  • üíÑ ‰øÆÂ§ç Menu È°π hover ÊñáÂ≠óËâ≤ÂΩ©ÁöÑÊ∏êÂèòÊïàÊûú„ÄÇ#31189
  • üêû ‰øÆÂ§ç Dropdown.Button ‰∏çÊîØÊåÅ overlayClassName Âíå overlayStyle ÁöÑÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ#31187
  • üíÑ ‰Ωø Pagination ÈÄâ‰∏≠Á¶ÅÁî®Áä∂ÊÄÅÁöÑÊåâÈíÆÊ†∑Âºè‰∏éÂçïÈÄâÊ°ÜÁõ∏Â∫îÊåâÈíÆÁöÑÊ†∑Âºè‰∏ÄËá¥„ÄÇ#31185 @Map1en
  • üêû ‰øÆÂ§çÂú® Windows ÁéØÂ¢É‰∏ãÊâìÂåÖÁªÑ‰ª∂Ê†∑ÂºèÂØºÂá∫Êñá‰ª∂Êó∂Ë∑ØÂæÑÈîôËØØ„ÄÇ#31277 @aoxiang78

item.title: Release notes from nng: Version 1.5.1 Bug Fix Release
item.content:encoded: This release just addresses problems with the version label and cmake version properties.

item.title: Release notes from next.js: v11.0.2-canary.11
item.content:encoded:
Core Changes

  • Add batching to zipkin reporter: #27082

item.title: Release notes from next.js: v11.0.2-canary.10
item.content:encoded:
Core Changes

  • Add newline to the end of next-env.d.ts: #27028
  • Add performance tracing for next-image-loader: #27043
  • Include message body in redirect responses: #25257
  • add support for esm externals: #27069
  • Enhance next dev performance with placeholder=blur: #27061

Example Changes

  • Update dependencies of all CMS examples.: #27001

Misc Changes

  • Update labeler.json
  • Mention running local changes inside monorepo: #27050

Credits

Huge thanks to @borekb, @leerob, @michielvangendt, @ijjk, @sokra, and @styfle for helping!

item.title: Release notes from storybook: v6.4.0-alpha.14
item.content:encoded:
Features

  • Web-components: Dynamic source snippets (#15337)

Maintenance

  • Essentials: Add measure addon to monorepo (#15545)

item.title: Release notes from Ghost: 4.9.2
item.content:encoded:
• üêõ Fixed GScan bug causing Ghost to throw 500 errors - Thibaut Patel

View the changelogs for full details:

  • Ghost - v4.9.1...v4.9.2
  • Ghost-Admin - TryGhost/Admin@v4.9.1...v4.9.2
